Package omp2gpu.hir

Class TextureSpecifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.hir.Specifier
      • omp2gpu.hir.CUDASpecifier
        • omp2gpu.hir.TextureSpecifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable
    public class TextureSpecifier
extends CUDASpecifier
    TextureSpecifier represents an Texture specifier in CUDA, for example texture texRef;
